email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I hope this email finds you well. We have a spot enquiry for 12,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel details? We are looking for a CFR arrangement.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the following:

Vessel: PACIFIC STAR
DWT: 75,000
LOA: 225m
Freight: USD 42/MT (CFR)
Laycan: 20-25 Oct 2023
Demurrage: USD 10,000 per day, pro rata.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
James Wilson
Cargo Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
James,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 42/MT seems a bit high. Can you sharpen the rate to USD 38/MT? Also, can you confirm the vessel's ETA in Shanghai?

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Laura,

I can bring the rate down to USD 40/MT, but that's the best I can do. The vessel's ETA in Shanghai is estimated to be around 5 Nov 2023, weather permitting.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
James,

USD 40/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan and send over the recap.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Great! Recap attached. Here are the confirmed details:

Commodity: Coal
Quantity: 12,000MT
Load Port: Newcastle
Discharge Port: Shanghai
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: PACIFIC STAR
Freight: USD 40/MT
Laycan: 20-25 Oct 2023
Demurrage: USD 10,000/day pro rata.

Thanks for the business!

Best regards,
James
